short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace reader insert variables with your own prefered settings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 0.0.0.5

Simple extension for replacing reader insert variables on Wattpad. Enter your settings and the page will automatically fill in the placeholders with your preferences.

Included support for
(Y/N) | (y/n) : Your name
(E/C) | (e/c) : Eye colour
(H/C) | (h/c) : Hair colour

Updates in version 0.0.0.5
- Updated chrome requirements to keep app on the store
- Migrated to a cleaner look with up to 24 custom mappings 
- Compacted custom mappings to only show which are used

Merry Christmas 2025

Note: If you continue through multiple chapters and the words aren't being replaced, simply refresh the page and they should show up! Happy reading!

Future plans include , custom delimiter not just "/" and ability to add more than 2 letters
